alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 10:36AM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Iowa...Missouri... Mississippi River at Keokuk LD19, Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Le Claire LD14, Fulton LD13, Bellevue LD12, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, Dubuque LD11, and Dubuque. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Camanche. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Water affects many homes in Camanche and is at the base of the Camanche water treatment plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 21.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 17.3 feet next Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening.
